translation:
Given your forged patriotism and distinct commitment to the cause in which the brave people of Rio Grande do Sul are engaged, you are entrusted with the agency of the monthly subscription decreed on November 10 of last year, as in the authentic council, for the urgencies of the current struggle for our independence; and it is expected that Your Excellency

The proceeds of said subscription will be sent to the Inspector of the National Treasury in this city. God keep Your Excellency.
